languageKey.label: SAV Library Kickstarter > Types > Radiobuttons
Attributes for the type RadioButtons
xEXT_sav_library_kickstarter_all:*,xEXT_sav_library_kickstarter_functions:*,xEXT_sav_library_kickstarter_general:*
cols = integer;
Number of columns to display.
displayAsImage = 1;
If set, the radio buttons are displayed as images instead of labels (default=0 for "basic" type library).
default = integer;
Default value for the radio buttons.
horizontalLayout = 1;
If set to 1, radio buttons are displayed horizontally in edit forms.
